title: [L2M] - Design & Implement Frame Agreements API for B2B
description:
Description
We aim to design and implement completely new API to fetch frame agreements in our B2B space. We will be using TMF 651 (Version 4.0) as our baseline. This new end point will be built in and for B2B area only. We will be using this new end point to fetch frame agreements during our O3 chains. Plus it could be further utilised by other services also as and when required.
acceptance_criteria: Source of Fixed net Framed agreements (CRM-T) is completely analysed
CRM-T Agreement Source data is modelled into  TMF 651 v4 conformant  structure
Detailed design flow for importing of Agreements is ready
Technical design and decisions related to database, cache mechanism, API end points, API filtering & framework is finalised and ready
Relevant User stories are built and implemented
New end point is reachable and serving relevant frame agreements information as response
Business validations, logging & alert mechanism is in place
